scripts.build: npm run copy:images && npm run build:templates && npm run build:styles
scripts.build:pagestyles: sass src/styles/page.scss docs/page.css --no-source-map && cleancss -o docs/page.css docs/page.css
scripts.build:utilitystyles: sass src/styles/utilities.scss docs/utilities.css --no-source-map && cleancss -o docs/utilities.css docs/utilities.css
scripts.build:styles: npm run build:pagestyles & npm run build:utilitystyles
scripts.start: npm run clear && npm run build && npm run serve & npm run watch
